description:
5 star reviews!

**Read the entire summary for extra bonuses you can't do without!**

Do you want to have your own website or blog? Would you love to enter a website name like this?

yournamehere dot com

You can with the WordPress platform and this course.

By the end of this 30 minute course, you'll have your own domain name, web hosting account, and WordPress blog ready for your new future!

Due to the ease of use and creative options, the WordPress platform is by and far the most widely used website building platform on the market today.

This course is designed for the beginner entrepreneur interested in starting their first blog or online website, but don't know how to begin.

This course will show you exactly how to set up your WordPress site through video and step by step, follow along instruction.

That means you can watch the video, pause the video, purchase a domain name, purchase a hosting account, and set up your WordPress site, all while watching the step by step instruction.

And if that isn't enough, you'll also receive three extra bonuses!

UnSlappable SEO Ebook - You need people to find you online right? This ebook will give you the tools to make sure your website or blog has a high ranking on Google!

WordPress Security Guard Ebook - Hackers are after you! That's right, given the chance, hackers will slip into your site and take it over ruining everything you're worked so hard to build. This ebook will show you exactly how to protect yourself from the enemy!

How to Set Up Your Blog (bonus video) - Did you know as great as WordPress is, there are things you need to change right away to get a blog started in the right direction? This bonus video will show you exactly what you should do to get your blog ready for it's first post.

So, if you're ready to start a new direction and new adventure in life, enroll in this course and start your website today!
title: Wordpress for Beginners: Domain, Hosting, Install in 30 Min!
